instructions: Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Android vitals > Deobfuscation files . Next to a version of your app, click Upload . Upload the ProGuard mapping file for the version of your app.
Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Android vitals > ANRs & Crashes . Select a crash. On the "Stack Traces" tab, you'll see your deobfuscated stack traces.
